experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.company: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign - Cline Center for Advanced Social Research
experience.description: Built ETL pipelines for ML tasks, improved classification models, and automated data collection with agentic AI. Created Power BI dashboards for global users and engineered clustering to reduce duplicate data by 88%.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Conducted advanced research in machine learning and data analysis, contributing to academic publications and developing innovative algorithms for data processing.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: Developed data visualization dashboards and performed statistical analysis on large datasets to drive business insights and decision-making processes.

skills.title: Data Science & ML
skills.skills: ETL Pipelines, Data Modeling, Product Analytics, Statistical Analysis, Hypothesis Testing, Feature Engineering, Predictive Modeling, Data Visualization, Deep Learning, Vector Databases

skills.title: Frameworks & Libraries
skills.skills: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Hugging Face, Transformers, Langchain, RAGs, LLMs

skills.title: Databases & Tools
skills.skills: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Jupyter, Apache Zookeeper, Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Apache Flink, Apache Hive, Apache Cassandra, Apache Airflow, dbt, BigQuery, Databricks, Excel

skills.title: Cloud & Analytics
skills.skills: AWS, Azure, Power BI, Tableau, Excel

skills.title: Specializations
skills.skills: Product Analytics, Causal Inference, Natural Language Processing, Time Series Analysis, A/B Testing, ETL Pipelines, Agentic AI

projects.name: The Scoop
projects.description: A web app to get the latest news and updates from the world.

projects.description: Knowledge management tool which uses RAG to answer questions about the natural language query.

projects.description: Does the 'Reactions Bar' of a mock social app improve user engagement?

projects.name: Analyzing the trends of Smartphone based on online reviews
projects.description: Comprehensive analysis of smartphone reviews using natural language processing and sentiment analysis.

projects.name: Random Forests from Scratch
projects.description: Implementing Random Forests Algorithm in Python from scratch to predict Tennis Australian Open winner.

projects.name: Movie Recommendation System
projects.description: A movie recommendation system that uses collaborative filtering to recommend movies to users based on their viewing history.

projects.name: Workout Tracking Application
projects.description: A workout tracking application that allows users to track their workouts and progress.

projects.name: Neural Networks from Scratch
projects.description: Creating a Neural Network to classify handwritten digits (MNIST dataset) implemented from scratch.

projects.name: Gym Occupancy Detection
projects.description: Comprehensive analysis of gym occupancy using computer vision and machine learning.

projects.name: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.description: End-to-end credit card fraud detection MLOps pipeline with comprehensive data analysis.
